main event: A bright red object the size of a baseball was observed traveling at a high speed and had an unfamiliar sound in Cunningham, Tennessee.
interesting points: The object changed color from bright red to bright white to blue-green during the sighting., The object was noticed from 3,000 to 4,000 feet altitude., The sighting lasted for about 12 minutes., The object disappeared suddenly without any visual confirmation of an aircraft., A sound resembling a helicopter was reported, but no aircraft were observed.
witness description: Civilian observer, possibly an unnamed radar operator.
